briefdescription.para: we aren't in charge of this address type
well-formed address but failed to set it up

memberdef.argsstring: (DBusTransport *transport, const DBusTransportVTable *vtable, const DBusString *server_guid, const DBusString *address)
memberdef.name: _dbus_transport_init_base

briefdescription.para: Initializes the base class members of DBusTransport.

detaileddescription.para: Chained up to by subclasses in their constructor. The server GUID is the globally unique ID for the server creating this connection and will be NULL for the client side of a connection. The GUID is in hex format.

parameterdescription.para: non-NULL if this transport is on the server side of a connection

briefdescription.para: Finalizes base class members of DBusTransport.

detaileddescription.para: Chained up to from subclass finalizers.

parameterdescription.para: the address entry to try opening
return location for the opened transport

ref.tooltip: Macro used prior to declaring functions in the D-Bus header files.
The virtual table that must be implemented to create a new kind of transport.
Object representing a transport such as a socket.
